name: songboook.com
description: or `how not too forget how to be a musician`.

scripts.devfr: cd frontend/; npm i; npm start; cd ../;
scripts.buildfe: cd frontend/; npm run build; cd ../; git add -A; git commit -a -m "deploy frontend Build"; git push;
scripts.deploy: npm i;npm run backup; npm run buildfe; heroku git:remote -a songbook-cvs; git push heroku main; npm run openprodurl;
scripts.backup: cd helpers/; node createDatabaseBackUpFile.js; cd ../; git add -A; git commit -a -m "database backup"; git push;

author: vanStaen
